item.title: #en @ 1465851138498961414
item.description: The Pacific Data Hub is built on the strengths, knowledge and wisdom of the Pacific. We launched 1 year ago with a commitment to drive innovation and creativity based on sound data from the region. And 1 year on this still drives our work. @MFATNZ @SPC_CPS #opendata #datasharing https://t.co/kt3iF84CVZ

item.title: #en @ 1465832668927389697
item.description: Air quality affects everyone. We don‚Äôt really think about breathing, but we breathe 3,000 gallons of air every single day. According to the @WHO over 90% of the world breathes poor air quality. Support @OpenAQ to connect more communities with #opendata https://t.co/9mPbarENo5

item.title: #en @ 1465830109080788994
item.description:
Why are these Finnish data so interesting?
Because they show no difference between dose 1 & 2 vax for preventing hospitalizations in those <30 (12-29 vuotiaat) & show how incredibly low the hosp rates are in kids even w/o vaccines (rokottamaton=unvax) https://t.co/pNCS1XNiHP https://t.co/cUY3gmcrXp

item.title: #en @ 1465283980635164679
item.description:
ONCEs.
For Mobile Users.
Here's the trick if you exceeded. Turn off mobile data. Airplane Mode. Wait for one minute.
Reconnect to your device or turn off the airplane mode. Then open data.
Then vote again (different account)
Do it again and again if you exceeded. https://t.co/BENJ9dtXHF
